title: Herb Farm NJ | Consultations | Plant Magic
cleaned_text: Herbs for Living Consultations herbal medicine + ritual for your real life A full herbal consultation, and so much more. We'll talk about health issues + what's going on in your life. You'll get a full herbal protocol + lifestyle recommendations + personal rituals to work through emotional and spiritual patterns. The process: Initial 1-hour consultation over Zoom. You receive a complete herbal protocol complete with relevant rituals. We have a 30-minute follow-up call two weeks after you begin taking your herbs. We check in four weeks later via email. Consultations are offered on a sliding scale. You choose the pricing that is most aligned with your resources. Tier 1 - $299 Tier 2 - $375
